attrs.name: center
attrs.desc: If this parameter is set to true, the header and bottom of the dialog box are automatically centered.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: is-form-reset
attrs.desc: Close the pop-up window. The form data is reset by default.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-close
attrs.desc: Whether to display the close button
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: draggable
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to enable the drag function for pop-up windows. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: fullscreen
attrs.desc: Whether the dialog box is displayed in full screen mode
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: modal
attrs.desc: Whether to enable the mask layer
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: close-on-click-modal
attrs.desc: Indicates whether pop-up windows can be closed by clicking the mask layer. The default value is true. You can set modal-closable="false" on the tag. The pop-up windows cannot be closed by clicking the mask layer.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: close-on-press-escape
attrs.desc: Specifies whether the mask layer can be disabled by pressing ESC.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: modal-append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether the mask layer is applied to the body. If the value is false, the mask layer is applied to the parent element of DialogBox.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: append-to-body
attrs.desc: Indicates whether the DialogBox itself is inserted into the body. This attribute must be specified and set to true for nested Dialogs.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: right-slide
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to enable the pop-up slide-out function. The default value is false.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: lock-scroll
attrs.desc: Whether to disable the scroll bar when a log is displayed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: show-header
attrs.desc: Indicates whether to display the pop-up header. The default value is true.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: top
attrs.desc: Height between the pop-up box and the top of the window. The default value is 15% of the screen height.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 15vh.

attrs.name: visible
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is true.

attrs.name: width
attrs.desc: Wideness of the dialog box that is displayed.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is 500px.

attrs.name: dialog-class
attrs.desc: Customized configuration pop-up window class name

slots.name: title
slots.desc: Dialog content in the title area

events.name: close
events.desc: Dialog disabled callback; Dialog closing callback; No arguments

events.name: open
events.desc: Dialog open callback; Dialog open callback; No arguments

events.name: opened
events.desc: Dialog: callback when the animation ends; No arguments

events.name: closed
events.desc: Dialog closes the callback when the animation ends. No arguments

events.name: drag-start
events.desc: Dialog drag start event; arg:event (including the location of the pop-up window)

events.name: drag-move
events.desc: Dialog dragging and moving event; arg:event (including the location of the pop-up window)

events.name: drag-end
events.desc: Dialog drag end event; arg:event (including the location of the pop-up window)
